pages.text: An axe that hungers for both Blood and Wood. When killing a creature or chopping down wood, the user becomes slightly stronger and their hands move quicker for 10 seconds. Continuous killings/choppings amplifies the effect. Should the user amplify the effect 5 times, the result has been described as 'explosive'.
The axe can be repaired on an anvil with a $(l:intro/magical_components)Cursed Metal Ingot$().
